Description.Name: LongTom Artillery Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Long Tom Ammo Bins each contain 20 rounds and may feed multiple weapons.

This is not only 4 tonns of ammo, but also the loading mechanism of the Long Tom Artillery.
